text:
It's finally time for the live to start!
Are you fired up?

Only moderately?
... Are you not very excited for the live?

No, how should I put it...
Continuing our earlier conversation about nervousness...

Seeing everyone getting all excited,
is actually calming me down. Or something like that...

I-I understand...
So you feel the opposite of everyone around you, right...?

Yeaaah...
and that being the case...

If I get less strict guidance from Producer,
I might be able to try ever hard, you know?

I understaâ”€...wait a minute! I'm not going to fall for that.
In fact, from here on out, I'm going to be even more relentless!

Ehh...
That's a bit troubling for me, though.
